text: is a stop on the Setagaya Line by Tokyu Corporation and is located in Segataya, Tokyo, Japan. ==Station layout== There are two side platforms on two tracks. ==Adjacent stations== ==Surroundings== ==History== The station opened on May 1, 1925, as and was renamed to the present name on October 16, 1939. Category:Tokyu Setagaya Line Category:Stations of Tokyu Corporation Category:Railway stations in Tokyo
title: Nishi-Taishidō Station
